definitions.definition: Ornate , intricate , decorated, laden with detail.
Complex and beautiful , despite an outward irregularity .
Chiseled from stone, or shaped from wood, in a garish , crooked, twisted, or slanted sort of way, grotesque .
Embellished with figures and forms such that every level of relief gives way to more details and contrasts.
Characteristic of Western art and music of the Early Modern period.

examples: baroque bookkeeping in pursuit of tax dodges

main_definition: Ornate , intricate , decorated, laden with detail.
